text: Aitor Etxeberría de la Rosa (born 21 February 1976 in Gorliz) is a Spanish rugby union player. He plays as a fly-half. He is left-footed and he usually filled in regularly for the injury-prone Kovalenco. ==Career== His first international match was against Andorra, at Andorra la Vella, on 8 November 1997. He was part of the 1999 Rugby World Cup roster, playing the match against South Africa. ==External links== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Basque rugby union players Category:Spanish rugby union players Category:Rugby union fly-halves Category:Spain international rugby union players Category:People from Mungialdea
title: Aitor Etxeberría
